title: Revaluation result
content: Did they release the revaluation results because i applied like just 5 days ago??

comments.body: Is this ESA revaluation? These take multiple weeks, maybe months to reflect. If its ISA, it takes at least 1-2 weeks.
Then you're gonna have to wait atleast a couple of weeks. ESA scores are finalised only at the middle of the *next* semester. That's when you can expect your reval results to be out.
How do you even know if they released it or not
Check the *Results* section of PESU academy
So its confirmed they released it?
